title: Curses & Blood
description: I thought my life was finally going my way. Boy, was I wrong.When a new job lands in my lap from the Dark Witch Court, with a very large paycheck, I take it. It should have been an easy gig. I was wrong again.Nothing is what it seems. When members of the Gray Council wind up dead, a new evil closes in and I find myself on a dangerous path.Just when I thought I could kick back and relax, the madness of the Netherworld and demons pulls me right back in.And I have no choice but to kick some serious butt.Curses & Blood is a fast-paced urban fantasy adventure with a kick-butt heroine and plenty of action, suspense and humor.
author: Kim Richardson
